title: Strengthening Medical Practical Competencies: Personalized Science Learning Pathway Design

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners understand and explain job-related scientific concepts with over 80% accuracy

Learners complete a 4-week personal learning path (3 modules per week, 12 total modules) provided by a corporate-customized LMS system, pass module quizzes (over 80% score) and a final science competency certification exam (over 70% score) to achieve target science competencies

In project-based assessments, learners apply scientific knowledge to propose solutions for three real-world work scenarios (e.g., patient data analysis, infection control protocol design, medical equipment usage training) and achieve over 4 points (on a 5-point scale) in four of five evaluation rubric items (problem definition accuracy, scientific rationale appropriateness, feasibility, creativity, report completeness)
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
